'''Berry & Mint Burst''' is a [[food]] item that can be purchased from [[Charles]] in [[Angel's Share]] (located in the [[City of Mondstadt]]) for 1,500 [[Mora]] (max 2 per day).

Berry & Mint Burst increases the party's CRIT Rate by 16% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]]; this effect only applies to the player's party.
